summary: This document is an email chain from June 24, 2020, forwarding a message from an individual who identifies as a victim and witness in the Jeffrey Epstein case to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York. The individual requests to speak to Audrey Strauss and be allowed to visit court to speak about the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the case; an individual is claiming to be a victim and witness regarding him.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The individual writing the email requests to be allowed to speak to Audrey Strauss.

events.title: Victim/Witness Email Forwarded to FBI
events.description: An email from an individual identifying as a victim and witness in the Jeffrey Epstein case is forwarded to an Assistant U.S. Attorney, following a practice of passing potential witness information to the FBI.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An individual contacted authorities on June 24, 2020, claiming to be both a victim and a witness in the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The individual specifically requested to speak to Assistant U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss and to visit court to speak about the case.
The email was forwarded to an AUSA in the Southern District of New York per a practice of passing potential witness information to the FBI.
The document shows an ongoing effort in mid-2020 to collect witness and victim information related to the Epstein case.
